author: jleroux
msg: Add a root.patch and allow to work correctly on Windows machines where patch.exe does not handle mixed EOLs (contrary to patch on Linux). This is due to SVN mixing EOLs when creating patches.

author: kstam
msg: JUDDI-463, now returning a real java.util.Date object to avoid issues with TimeStamp.

author: jeremias
msg: Internally registers not only font families but also makes font available through their font names.
All CSS font weights are now handled for font selection
Font families containing numbers (like "Univers 45 Light") no longer cause errors.
